name: DEAR SKY Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Fresh.Scent Type:Fresh Florals.Key Notes:Honeydew Melon, White Peony, Ambrette.Fragrance Description:Radiant, confident, and beautiful, DEAR SKY evokes southwest skies and crystal prisms. It‚Äôs an ode to the American West and the wild souls that light and blaze their own paths. A modern fruity floral, this fragrance sparkles with honeydew melon, strawberry leaf, white peony, and galbanum..About the Bottle:The iridescent bottle is inspired by the beautiful prismatic light at sunset in the American Southwest..About the Fragrance:Ellis Brooklyn‚Äôs founder, Bee Shapiro, spent time in Texas these past few years and was inspired by the light and energy there to create DEAR SKY. She was also inspired by her bold, fearless, creative, and radiant daughter Sky..Clean
ingredients: Alcohol Denat, Fragrance, Water, Citric Acid, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Alpha-Isomethyl-ionone, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Cinnamal, Cinnamyl Alcohol, Citral, Citronellol, Eugenol, Farnesol, Geraniol, Hydroxycitronellal, Isoeugenol, Limonene, Linalool...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense...Recycling Instructions:.-Remove cap and rinse out glass before recycling.

shades.shade_name: 1.7 oz / 50 mL eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume. It's delicate feminine and elegant. It's a 10/10 for me. It might be my new signature scent üíú Its a princess scent üåü

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super clean, crisp and floral. My top pick above so many designer fragrances ‚Ä¶ I mix with j‚Äôadore d‚Äôeau with it and it‚Äôs my DREAM scent !! Chefs kiss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just another ‚Äúclean girl‚Äù smell from this brand. If you want a sharp, clean fragrance that needs to be reapplied every 4hrs, this is a good choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does anyone else get the scent of pencil shavings with a hint of bar soap from this when it dries down‚Ä¶? üò¨  But the packaging! Oh the packaging is SO stunning! I almost want to keep it just for the bottle‚Ä¶

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Delicious, Amazing, Feminine & I just love it so much!!! It is not overpowering but still packs a punch! I will be ordering the 50 mL next time for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the bottle is stunning I just wish it didn't smell like a cheap 90s perfume you'd get at Walgreens

reviews.review_title: GREAT SCENT,, just be sure to wear lotion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's an amazing scent just be sure to wear lotion so it has something to bind to. it definitely isn't bad, but it isn't the strongest or most long wearing perfume I've used. it's a lovely uplifting scent for anyone, i could see this smelling great on men too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got the discovery kit, the memoir one & it has this scent as well as the Miami Nectar scent which are the 2 I have been DYING to try so 2 birds, one order. This one has me hooked by the first spritz & I ordered a travel size until I can afford the bigger bottle !! I love Ellis Brooklyn's fragrances so much  this is super amazing smelling, it's floral and sweet with light musk & I'm not a big musk person but this is now my favorite perfume and a staple in my collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best way to describe this is as if you've just taken a shower with middle of the range toiletries (like higher end of the drugstore products). It's soapy and floral like herbal essences meets a dove bar. Nothing overly original or unique, but it lasts several hours and smells just generally pleasant and I think it would suit many occasions.

reviews.review_title: A very pretty floral with soft woodsy fruit notes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first spray is a very powerful floral with a very mild hint of the rhubarb. Thankfully, the dry down brings forth the strawberry leaf , peony & the cedar. My hubby and I both agree that even though it's not listed , there is a mild vanilla note which is most likely the ambrette note. So happy I ordered this , as It was well worth a wait. I must say it is not incredibly original but it is very pretty and very feminine. I will purchase again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i like this fragrance. I think that this is a easy reach for around the house or a bedtime scent. The white peony is very loud. so if you are not a super fan of white florals i say try to get a sample or the tester. All in all i really like this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Sephora beauty insider community ambassador and this is my honest opinion, it's such a beautiful fragrance! I would call it light and sweet, a touch sensual. Not extremely long lasting, but the dry down makes it worth it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Successful blind buy. Lovely creamy, fresh, green fruity floral. Rather soapy & shampoo like, but I adore that vibe. Rhubarb, melon & strawberry leaf make the opening very green & fruity. Pink pepper gives it a little spice, while tuberose comes out after about 2 hours & adds depth. It settles into a soft, floral ambrette drydown.   I purchased it while staying in Nevada & it really does evoke a sense of place. Not a dupe of Mojave Ghost or Cowgirl Grass, but it evokes a similar feeling.

like the other review said: happy with my blind buy. I bought this fragrance without trying in store and before the official launch because I was intrigued by the notes. it is absolutely amazing, fresh, floral, fruity. sooooo good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This dear sky eau de parfum was free by ellis brooklyn and sephora and it smells amazing! The smell is super long lasting and I get alot of compliments on the smell! The size is also perfect to throw in my purse

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the sweet and floral notes, I like that it is very feminine and kind of fresh. I am not the type to like flowery scents but this one is not too bad. I will continue to use this fragrance, maybe more so during spring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love how fresh this perfume is! Smells like a very fresh floral scent that is light and airy. Not overwhelming at all so perfect for everyday use. The packaging is very pretty which is a plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Ellis Brooklyn and Skeepers for providing me opportunity to try this amazing fragrance. it has light fragrance and love it as strong smells sometime made me headache. it has woody and sweet scent which is incredible. am wearing mostly daily and loving it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I only got this perfume a few weeks ago but have received so many compliments about the fragrance. So I will definitely be reordering as soon as I run out. It is that perfect elevated day to day fragrance perfect for the start of new year.

reviews.review_title: So glad that I bought it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is 5 stars for me!  I love the hint of fruit and floral, it's light and so beautiful!  This will be my everyday scent going forward.  I love Ellis Brooklyn and I've already gotten compliments on this one!  The bottle is stunning too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really fresh and lovely! Love the notes of peony and strawberry leaf

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I blind bought this based off the reviews and regret it! It‚Äôs way too juicy fruity and smells like a cheap bath and body works spray. It‚Äôs giving me a headache. I will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying anything from Ellis Brooklyn, and boy did it not disappoint! The Dear Sky Eau De Parfum is the perfect mix of fruity and floral and can definitely be used all year round.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, I love Ellis Brooklyn. But‚Ä¶I feel like they missed the mark with this one. It‚Äôs too floral. I smell no melon or strawberry. Which greatly disappointed me. If I could give zero stars I would. Returning asap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: NEW! Review DEAR SKY Eau de Parfum by Ellis Brooklyn has a subtle, very feminine aroma with a floral touch. It lasts several hours, I liked using it in the summer but I could also use it without problem in the winter. I also enjoy the mini size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying this brand and I love how refreshing the scent of DEAR SKY is. However, I feel it doesn't last long on me. Because of this, I apply it right out of the shower so it can work with the warmth of my skin and I can get the most out of the lovely, fresh scent. It's light enough for a nice every day scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for a review. The sun is so lovely and great as a light every day sent. The size is perfect to slip into a small handbag and travel with you. I would recommend this fragrance to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely a Fruity Floral!  It‚Äôs a very pretty, soft scent and as a big gourmand girl, I actually don‚Äôt mind it.  The florals aren‚Äôt in your face so I would say it‚Äôs fruit forward.  I can see myself enjoying this through the cooler Fall months too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is amazing! If you are the type of person who likes fresh-floral perfume, this is for you!! It feels amazing each time I use it because it provides a really cool, citrus, and refreshing sensation that I love. Definitely, thinking of getting the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this perfume to try out in exchange for my review. upon first spray i get hints of the honeydew melon & green strawberry. then the white peony sticks out between the dry down. on the dry down it mellows out until a beautiful woody fruity perfume like smell that is really nice and is very pretty for summer time, honestly i think it can be worn year round. I enjoy this fragrance, i think it‚Äôs a clean and wearable floral that works for all ages!

such a clean yet floral scent! it lasts pretty long too. i still catch whiffs of it during the evening time even though i applied it in the morning! i only got the travel size, i definitely want to buy the full size next!

reviews.review_title: A little old smelling for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was very excited for this perfume based on the notes, but it ended up smelling very old on me. Didn‚Äôt really get any freshness or fruitiness from it but just smelled kind of like grandma-ish on me unfortunately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great if you like strong floral scents.  I blind bought this one taking a chance, but it's not for me. Will be returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells so good. I can just use one spray in the morning and it lasts me all day. The bottle is a typical travel person bottle, however, the design on the packaging is very cute. It has a pearly color that is very pretty. The perfume itself smells very girly, fresh, powdery, clean, etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Ellis Brooklyn Dear Sky Eau de Parfum, and it‚Äôs honestly such a dreamy scent. It‚Äôs airy and fresh, with a mix of clean florals and a hint of creamy woodiness that feels both comforting and uplifting. It‚Äôs perfect for those days when you want a scent that‚Äôs subtle yet memorable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Took a risk with getting a perfume without testing the scent and it was a good risk to take. It‚Äôs a beautiful smell. Very feminine and floral but not old lady like at all. The bottle is also the perfect size to throw in your purse for on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The floral and woody notes are stunning and uplifting! However, I do have one drawback: the longevity. Unfortunately, the scent doesn't last as long as I'd like, fading away after just a few hours. Despite this, I still can't get enough of Dear Sky - the smell is just that beautiful! If longevity isn't a top priority for you, or if you don't mind reapplying throughout the day, then this fragrance is definitely worth trying. For me, the gorgeous scent outweighs the lack of staying power, but I do wish it lasted longer. Maybe a stronger concentration or a matching body product would help?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm really not a fan of this scent. It starts off very green and citrusy. I don‚Äôt get the honeydew melon but I get the strawberry leaf and the rubharb but I especially get the bergamot. The dry down is clean and floral with a slightly musky base. I find this scent dna a bit repetitive. Clean citrusy floral musk. I‚Äôve smelled this before and it‚Äôs nothing new. I love the bottle but that‚Äôs all this perfume has going for it. Longevity wasn‚Äôt great either. I‚Äôd say skip this one unless you‚Äôre just looking for a simple everyday fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised by the scent of this perfume; it doesn't evoke the southwestern vibe mentioned in the description. Instead, it opens with crisp citrus notes and evolves into a very floral, feminine fragrance. I was hoping to find more interesting note like honeymoon, but it is suitable to people love floral notes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This fragrance is the perfect feminine touch of scents. It‚Äôs a sweet and clean scent. It wears for long periods of time and it lingers. The packaging is so pretty. I love that the mini fragrance is a spray not a roll on. You don‚Äôt have to use a lot either to get your point across.

reviews.review_title: Great if you enjoy floral scents!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product in exchange for my honest review. This perfume smelled just okay to me. It definitely has a strong floral scent to it so if you like floral perfumes you may enjoy this one. It did last throughout the day which I appreciated as I feel like often times the scents on perfumes don‚Äôt last throughout the day. The packaging was also very pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really wasn‚Äôt my favorite for a perfume, it definitely smelled okay but also just gave me kind of a cheap vibe. I wouldn‚Äôt by this for someone above the age of 16. So if you‚Äôre looking for something that smells like this I‚Äôd go to a cheaper option because this isn‚Äôt really worth the price to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for this post. I like the color and design of the packaging, it is thin but elegant and easy to use, the aroma is refreshing, it reminds me of a sunset on the beach, I also love the notes that it has melon, strawberry leaf, white peony and galbanum, I want it in size complete next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôve been using Dear Sky eau de parfum by ELLIS BROOKLYN for a few weeks now, and I absolutely love it! The scent is both elegant and pretty, striking the perfect balance between sophisticated and fresh. It has become my go-to fragrance, and I always receive compliments when I wear it. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a beautiful, long-lasting scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm absolutely obsessed with the smell of Ellis Brooklyn‚Äôs Dear Sky perfume! It‚Äôs such a unique and captivating fragrance that feels both fresh and comforting. Every time I wear it, I get compliments, and it lingers beautifully throughout the day. This scent has quickly become a staple in my perfume collection‚Äîit's truly mesmerizing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a pretty and light scent. It‚Äôs a floral but it‚Äôs has something else to it. I love how it smells and lingers through out the day. I find myself smelling my wrist to get more of it. This is great for everyday or for a signature scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a fun fresh floral perfume! It almost has a bubbly freshness to it. I think it is pretty unique in its category in my collection and will definitely be wearing it all Summer long. Love the fruit twists too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It‚Äôs not a bad scent, but not my preference. It smells kinda like something I would find in my grandmother‚Äôs house. It‚Äôs a very strong floral scent. This is one that you‚Äôll only need one spray of. I‚Äôd recommend testing it before buying a full bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Smells so pretty and so clean wow! I‚Äôm in love with this scents, it‚Äôs giving Chloe vibes and just clean girl soft aesthetic energy. You need to sniff this if you love refreshing clean scents! Smells like you walked out of a shower but better some how?!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Ellis Brooklyn Dear Sky is now one of my favorite Eau De Parfum. It smells citrusy and fresh at the same time. The smell is so refreshing to my senses and it lasts on my skin all day. I would totally recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is now one of my favorite perfumes. The scent is a strong but good smell and stays on all day. I put this perfume on in the morning and after being out all day and night you could still smell the perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this perfume. It‚Äôs fresh and feminine but not too overpowering. I feel like I can wear this year round as it fits most occasions. It lasts a few hours on my skin and has a good throw. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying a scent from this brand and I have to say I am so impressed!! I love the light summer vibes. It gives such a fresh feel and in summer urs perfect balance of a womanly fresh bright scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The way they describe this scent is exactly what it is! It‚Äôs an elevated fruity scent with hints of floral as well! It feels very light and a great everyday scent for me that is perfect for summer. I love that this brand uses upcycled materials and their products are cruelty free as well. This is my current go-to scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so delicious! It smells like a garden without being overly floral. It's the perfect warm weather scent. I love how the ambrette really balances the flowers. The notes are actually perfect - my favorite from Ellis so far!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I wore this perfume on a night out I got so many compliments on it has a really good projection and I love the top note of Bergamont. It‚Äôs one of my favorite cents and I love having the spray for the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this fragrance. I thought it would be sweet but it‚Äôs the perfect balance of floral but semi sweet and it lasts a long time. I even smell it on my jackets the next day, which I love. I like the spray applicator because it‚Äôs easy to use and I love the slick design.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful fragrance I got this travel size and is perfect to take it with me everywhere I received many compliments from people who loves how Delish smell it! This is perfect to wear it all sumer!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is a well balanced fruity floral that is fresh, youthful, and daytime appropriate. There aren't any particular notes that stand out for me but it's an overall pleasant spring/summer fragrance. It does not have the greatest longevity; I personally feel the need to touch up about halfway through the day. The packaging is really cute, especially the travel spray that comes in an iridescent bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: oh my gosh it smells so good like a warm summer fruity floral day full of happiness! i really like it and i feel like the lasting power is also pretty great, im impressed and thankful to try this perfume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first sniff I thought that I would not like this one and it would be too mature. After a little mist onto myself I was happily surprised the fruit scents pulled in stronger than the florals and it‚Äôs actually quite nice. It reminds me of Light Blue but a little more on the fruit side. Once I read that one of the notes was honeydew the scent all made sense. I‚Äôll definitely keep wearing this one but I don‚Äôt think this one is my signature scent. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôll be someone‚Äôs. The bottle is so pretty for the travel size. If the glass on the full size is the same I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs great too! I do have a friend who broke hers and the glass does feel potentially a little thin. I don‚Äôt know that I‚Äôd actually want to take this in my suitcase as it might break. I do enjoy having travel sizes as a cheaper option to try out a perfume so it‚Äôs not a dealbreaker that I wouldn‚Äôt actually travel with this. For travel I usually bring samples anyways.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have found my new signature scent! Ellis Brooklyn Dear Sky is a beautiful floral fragrance that is not heavy, but light and modern. I was impressed with this company before even trying the product because they focus on renewable and up cycles ingredients. Dear Sky is paraben free, cruelty free, and vegan. This fresh scent makes me feel confidant and beautiful when wearing. The iridescent bottle adds the perfect touch of light to my makeup table. I receive so many compliments when I wear this perfume, from both men and women. It is light enough for daily use, but memorable enough for special occasions. With how much I have been wearing it, I know that I will soon be replacing my empty bottle of Dear Sky with another!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Perfume smells SOO GOOD!!  It‚Äôs such a pretty light floral scent! My man defff noticed it right away when I put it on so I definitely recommend! He loved it! It‚Äôs a nice scent for everyday use! And the scent does last all day for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so amazing. I add it to my clothes every morning right before work and as soon as I walk into the office building, I get compliments on the scent. It lasts about halfway so you would need to touch up.

Typically I lean towards skin scents, but I have been using Dear Sky daily and absolutely love it. It has a light but warm scent that is perfect year around. It settles and takes on the feel of a skin scent, and lasts all day. I absolutely recommend this- it‚Äôs fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i absolutely love this dear sky perfume. it is so feminine and flirty, its fruity and floral. i love how it lasts well throughout the day. it is the perfect scent for end of summer early fall. i love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‚Äôm so picky about my perfumes, but there is something special about this one. It‚Äôs fresh and light but still so beautifully fragrant. It‚Äôs more of a day time perfume and it lasts all day long. It layers well over my coconut body butter too!

reviews.review_title: Super fresh fragrance for all day long
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A completely floral fragrance of tuberose, some citrus like bergamot and some woody sparkles. It is very fresh and subtle but long-lasting so that I feel and smell modern and radiant all day long. It is easily a fragrance that can be used in summer and spring for its fresh floral notes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: great scent that lasts on the skin all day. Is a clean scent with a little bit of sweetness. Travel size is great to throw in my purse! I always get compliments when I‚Äôm wearing it. Such a luxurious scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My experience with the Ellis Brooklyn DEAR SKY eau de parfum travel spray was delightful. The fragrance opens with a fresh and vibrant blend of bergamot essence and honeydew melon, balanced by a hint of rhubarb and strawberry leaf. As it settles, the floral notes of tuberose and white peony are beautifully complemented by a touch of pink pepper. The dry down is warm and comforting, thanks to the ambrette and upcycled cedarwood. It's a refreshing and sophisticated scent that feels both unique and versatile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What drew me to this fragrance were the fruity floral notes. Bergamot, Rhubarb, Honeydew, and Strawberry mixed with peony is a great combination. It smells like a bright fresh floral that is not overpowering. This is going to be my new daily fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this perfume.  To me,  it is a very fresh scent. I do think this can be either a summer scent and possibly a fall scent.  I would definitely recommend this perfume to my friends and family...

reviews.review_title: The best perfume in my collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the DEAR SKY Eau de Parfum by Ellis Brooklyn and these are my honest thoughts. When I first opened it OMG! That was my reaction. it is the most amazing wonderful flowery scented perfume I have smelled in my entire life!! I can't put words on how amazing this perfume is! Buy this asap and thank me later. I will be buying the full size bottle. That's how amazing it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My goodness ! This is the first scent I tried from this brand and omg it smells soo good ! My mom even tried to steal it from me lol it smelled so fresh and sweet at the same time but it was not over bearing !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume has such a clean and refreshing scent! It was long lasting and only required a few spritz to last the entire day. I usually spray my chest and wrists and was good to go. The branding was even pretty and aesthetic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful scent and it lasts all day! I get so many compliments when I wear this. It‚Äôs a lovely fruity smell that‚Äôs very elegant and not overpowering. I love the mid notes of white peony

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is EXACTLY what summer smells like. It's sweet and fruity with hints of floral and brings back some lost memories of summer as a kid. The dry down is woody and is reminiscent of driftwood on the beach.  I will be reaching for this for the rest of the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand! The scent of this perfume smells son heavenly and so good! It‚Äôs perfect for traveling and taking it with my in my bag! I love that it lasts a long time and get to smell it through the day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smelled nice, not as complex as I thought it might. It‚Äôs also not as sweet as I anticipate which was actually a perk. The packaging is absolutely GORG! The travel size comes with a spray nozzle. The biggest bummer about this one is that it had no lasting power for me. I only got 1-2 hours out of it. But I know that will vary for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I always love to carry a perfume in my purse and this travel size is perfect for it. This smells so good!! I am one to like many different types of fragrances and usually pick one based on my mood. For this one, I want to wear it when I‚Äôm in a good, fun, energetic mood.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly the packaging is beautiful and iridescent. I love it. The description of this fragrance is spot on in that it is a true fresh floral. It‚Äôs very floral forward with and airy outside garden note to it as well. On my skin this lasted about 4 hours without reapplying. This is not the typical fragrance I would reach for because I do prefer sweeter and fruity scents with my florals but if you love the smell of fresh cut flowers, warm summer breeze and a touch of citrus that I did not expect, you will love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bergamot Essence, Rhubarb, Honeydew Melon, and Strawberry Leaf elements create a vibrant and refreshing fragrance that captures attention with its lively and multifaceted opening. Bergamot Essence Adds a bright, citrusy, and slightly spicy note, providing a refreshing and uplifting start.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dear Sky by Ellis Brooklyn is a really refreshing and light perfume. It starts off with a bright, fruity vibe thanks to the pear and bergamot, which feels super clean and fresh. Then, it softens into a gentle floral scent with peony and iris that‚Äôs not too overpowering. The dry down has a cozy touch with a bit of musk and vanilla, making it perfect for everyday wear. It‚Äôs the kind of scent that‚Äôs easygoing and comforting, just right for anyone who likes a fresh and laid-back fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful light scent that stays on throughout the day. I haven‚Äôt found myself having to reapply it, which is so nice. It‚Äôs a very fresh and feminine scent, without being overpowering. I love the smaller size too because I can keep it in my gym bag, work bag, and purse without worrying about breaking it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Dear Sky is my new go-to fragrance! It‚Äôs the perfect blend of fruity and floral, making me feel confident and uplifted every time I wear it. The balance of sweetness and freshness is just right‚Äînot too overpowering, not too subtle. It‚Äôs like a little boost of happiness in a bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DEAR SKY lives up to its description, immediately giving off a radiant, beautifully unique scent from the first spray. Never smelled a fragrance like this before! Highly recommend for those looking for something truly beautiful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume is so fresh, light, and feminine. I get clean floral vibes from it. It‚Äôs very strong so you only need 1-2 sprays and it lasts a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty! It‚Äôs fresh and feminine. I‚Äôve been wearing so many gourmands lately that it‚Äôs nice To add something different to my collection. I get the melon but not the strawberry as much.

reviews.review_title: Wish the staying power was better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very beautiful fruity floral perfume. I‚Äôm used to something much warmer.. but this is nice. I‚Äôd say this is a spring day perfume. This also doesn‚Äôt have a very good lasting power. I‚Äôd say this only stays on for 3 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh my! Ellis has probably made the best scent of the summer. I cannot stop spraying this delectable scent. The juicy notes of Honeydew Melon, Rhubarb and Strawberry Leaf dance together with and elegant Bergamont and pink pepper finish
